description: Experiencing immersive, intense longing that permeates entire being with deep internal craving creating sense of incompleteness. Feeling magnetic pull toward object of desire with mix of anticipation, excitement, and sweet ache as yearning becomes central focus. Finding both exhilarating and soothing experience through clarity of desire and promise of fulfillment while surrendering completely to enveloping feeling.
appeal: Attracts individuals who find ordinary satisfaction insufficient and crave the intensity that comes from sustained desire and longing. Appeals to those seeking emotional depth through perpetual want rather than fulfillment, finding pleasure in the ache itself. The dynamic creates addictive cycles where yearning becomes self-reinforcing, making subjects dependent on states of incompleteness. This mechanism exploits the brain's reward anticipation systems, keeping subjects in heightened states of desire that become more compelling than actual satisfaction.
